name: The Only Danger is You
description:
This is a project made for the 2021 Blackthornprod GameJam.

Controls:

- Change direction with A-D/Arrow keys.

- That's it!

Welcome to the arena!

Your objective is to shoot down as many targets as you can in 1 minute  using the turrets in your body. Eat the green orbs to earn an additional body and increase your chance of scoring higher!

But beware... The more you eat, the more likely you will get hit by your own bullets.

Will you sacrifice your safety for a higher score? Or will you master the cannons and play it safe?

You are the only one responsible for your survival. The only danger... is you.

This is the first build. Sounds and additional details are to be added before the deadline. Feedback is welcome!
